name: Jenny Stahl

topics.response_text: Now I KNOW I've never seen you in Megaton before. Let me guess  just passing through, right?
Sorry, hon. The noodle stand is closed. If you want something, ask Leo in the restaurant.

topics.topic_text: That's all I needed to know.
topics.response_text: Let me know if you need anything else!

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for my father. Middle-aged guy. Maybe you've seen him?
topics.response_text: Oh man, you're looking for your dad? That is so sweet! Did he run out on you when you were a kid or something?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Megaton?
topics.response_text: Some people hate this place, but I guess it's their right, what the hell do they want out of life? Food, shelter and safety. Works for me.{hyper/drugged up but sarcastic}
I ain't heard much. Truth be told, I don't really ever leave the Lantern. Too much work, too few hours in the day, y'know?

conversation.response_text: Food, Jericho. It's all I had for you yesterday. It's all I have for you today.  It's all I'll ever have for you.
I'm not going to discuss it, Jericho. You know good and goddamn well why I'm like this and don't you dare play dumb with me.
People don't change, Jericho. Now order something and leave me alone.

description:
Jenny Stahl is a 24 year-old Caucasian Female.

Jenny Stahl is a 24-year-old human woman of Caucasian descent and a citizen of Megaton. She is one of the proprietors of The Brass Lantern, a popular tavern in the town. Jenny is known for her friendly demeanor and her role as a mediator between her brothers, Leo and Andy.

Jenny Stahl's Personality: Jenny is friendly, approachable, and level-headed. She has a natural talent for diffusing tense situations, which makes her an effective mediator between her brothers. Despite the challenges of living in the post-apocalyptic wasteland, she maintains a positive outlook and is always willing to help fellow settlers. She is hardworking, responsible, and takes pride in running the Brass Lantern.

Jenny Stahl's Backstory: Jenny Stahl was born in 2253 to a family that originally lived somewhere in the eastern United States before the bombs fell. Her family eventually made their way to the Capital Wasteland and settled in Megaton, where they established The Brass Lantern. Jenny grew up in the tavern, learning the ropes of the business from her parents. When they passed away, Jenny and her brothers took over the establishment. Jenny often finds herself mediating disputes between her brothers, who have different approaches to running the tavern. She values the stability and community of Megaton and is committed to maintaining the tavern as a safe haven for travelers and settlers alike.
